mapper.update: UPDATE paper SET title = #{title}, description = #{description}, total_questions = #{totalQuestions}, total_score = #{totalScore}, difficulty = #{difficulty}, teacher_name = #{teacherName}, updated_at = #{updatedAt} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT pq.id, pq.paper_id AS paperId, pq.question_id AS questionId, pq.score, pq.sort_order AS sortOrder, q.question_text AS question, q.answer AS answer FROM paper_question pq LEFT JOIN question q ON pq.question_id = q.id WHERE pq.paper_id = #{paperId} ORDER BY pq.sort_order
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO paper_question (paper_id, question_id, score, sort_order) VALUES (#{paperId}, #{questionId}, #{score}, #{sortOrder})

mapper.delete: DELETE FROM paper_question WHERE paper_id = #{paperId} AND question_id = #{questionId}
